verses.verse: Oh <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>: <S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%>; Show <S%H1319>forth<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, His <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> works among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: He is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5797>him<s%>: Strength and <S%H8597>beauty<s%> are in his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due unto his <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H2691>courts<s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>: The <S%H8398>world<s%> also is <S%H3559>established<s%> that it cannot be <S%H4131>moved<s%>: He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity<s%>.
Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%>, and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>; Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393>thereof<s%>;
Let the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5937>exult<s%>, and all that is <S%H6086>therein<s%>; Then shall all the trees of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he <S%H935>cometh<s%>, For he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with his <S%H530>truth<s%>.
